channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Chez Amazon, ce disque dur externe Western Digital perd 20 % de son prix et rend vos données inviolables
item.description: Pour stocker toutes vos données sans aucun problème, ce Western Digital emporte 5 To, mais aussi un logiciel de sauvegarde automatique. Chez Amazon, il perd 20 % de son prix et chute à 136,70 euros.

item.title: 10 storage technologies that want to replace hard drives
item.description: From enterprise flash to experimental archival media, these are ten technologies looking to replace traditional hard drives... one day.

item.title: The 34 best shows of 2025: TechRadar's top TV picks on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more
item.description: 2025 has been jam-packed with top-tier TV shows – here are TechRadar's favorite ones of the last 12 months.

item.title: ‘Last Airbender’ Fans Will Fight to See Their ‘Avatar’ in Theaters
item.description: Longtime fans of the Nickelodeon show aren't just letting Paramount punt the franchise's first animated movie out of theaters.

item.title: On a testé la veste vélo imperméable Gorewear Lupra 2.0 : elle brave la pluie sans broncher
item.description: Pratique pour le quotidien, imperméable et respirante, la veste Gorewear Lupra 2.0 Gore-Tex vous habille parfaitement lors de vos trajets à vélo. Nous l'avons testé, voici notre verdict.

item.title: 8 great games for your Steam Deck from 2025
item.description: I played a lot of games on my Steam Deck this year. It seemed like there was a never-ending list of incredible indie games to try - The Verge wrote about a lot of them! - and many worked brilliantly on Valve's handheld gaming PC. Some bigger games made a splash on Steam Deck, too, […]

item.title: 2025 in iPhones: the good, the bad, and the Cosmic Orange
item.description: The past 12 months have been a bit of a rollercoaster for Apple's iPhones, with plenty of promise and a few missteps.

item.title: Hyperkin The Competitor Controller Review: A DualSense Copycat
item.description: This copycat controller can’t clone the PS5’s best features, but it’s a solid option for Xbox and PC gamers.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 is tipped to get satellite and gaming boosts — but the pricing remains a mystery
item.description: We're getting a better idea of what to expect from the Samsung Galaxy S26, but the price is very much to be confirmed.
